item.title: How To Use EmailGPT
item.description: Learn how to install, use, and get the most out of our EmailGPT Chrome extension with our step-by-step guide.

item.title: About EmailGPT
item.description:
What is EmailGPT?

Your AI-powered assistant for managing complex email threads EmailGPT is a Chrome Extension that enhances Gmail by summarizing, organizing, and clarifying long email conversations. Designed for users who frequently deal with lengthy threads, EmailGPT helps you:

  • Summarize entire conversations into concise highlights
  • Break down individual messages with redundant content filtered out
  • Automatically identify and highlight action items and requests
  • Suggest smart replies using AI integration

Stay informed, respond quickly, and reduce email fatigueâ€”all from within your email app.
